revised_title: Algal Lipochromes and Sterols: A Comprehensive Study of Algal Classes
tldr: This article investigates the lipochromes and sterols of various algal classes, analyzing their pigments and sterols to determine if there is a relationship between botanical classification and the presence of specific substances. The authors examine algae from seven out of eleven algal classes, focusing on the main orders of each class, and discuss the importance of using fresh, uncontaminated material for analysis.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Algae Biology
